Trump says U.S. needs to impose tariffs on ChinaRepublican presidential candidate Donald Trump said he would impose tariffs on China again if he is elected in November and they could exceed 60 percent. Sun, 04 Feb 2024 15:58:16 GMT X5EJXT6D6BODRAWQNBGSRRH7R4 https://www.reuters.com/world/us/republican-candidate-trump-china-tariffs-we-have-done-it-2024-02-04/Reuters世界美国
Messi misses Miami's Hong Kong friendly as organisers face govt funding cutLionel Messi's three days of adulation in Hong Kong ended in heartbreak for his fans as the Argentine did not take to the field in Inter Miami's 4-1 win against a local League XI in a friendly played in front of a sellout crowd on Sunday. Sun, 04 Feb 2024 10:38:50 GMT OSDTEAYRNVOELHVABMCCKBQF2Q https://www.reuters.com/sports/soccer/love-heartbreak-king-messis-inter-miami-hit-hong-kong-2024-02-04/Joyce Zhou, Edmond Ng运动的足球
Chinese turn U.S. embassy post into 'Wailing Wall' for stock plungeMany Chinese are venting their frustration at the slowing economy and the weak stock market in an unconventional place: the social media account of the U.S. Embassy in Beijing. Sun, 04 Feb 2024 09:03:46 GMT EC4VV3EBXZKSXEEQWE37L7F2FM https://www.reuters.com/markets/chinese-turn-us-embassy-post-into-wailing-wall-stock-plunge-2024-02-04/Reuters市场
China's Wuxi AppTec says it should not be 'company of concern' in draft US biotech billChina's WuXi AppTec said on Sunday it has no affiliation with any governments or their military organisations, and it should not be listed as a "biotechnology company of concern" in a draft U.S. bill. Sun, 04 Feb 2024 08:59:56 GMT UJFCJG6KGNPT7AH2WNCOSTU2LM https://www.reuters.com/business/healthcare-pharmaceuticals/chinas-wuxi-apptec-says-it-should-not-be-company-concern-draft-us-biotech-bill-2024-02-04/Reuters可持续发展气候与能源
Foxconn sees 'slightly better' 2024, warns on AI chip shortageTaiwan's Foxconn , Apple's biggest iPhone assembler and the world's largest contract electronics maker, expects its business this year to be "slightly better" than last year but is facing a shortage of chips for AI servers. Sun, 04 Feb 2024 08:39:34 GMT 4TNLA756EZOCFPKQQMFOD6JZXQ https://www.reuters.com/technology/foxconn-sees-slightly-better-2024-warns-ai-chip-shortage-2024-02-04/Reuters技术
China's Country Garden says over 30 projects have local government supportCash-strapped developer Country Garden said on Saturday more than 30 of its projects had been listed by Chinese local governments as suitable for financing support, as authorities aim to inject liquidity into the crisis-hit sector. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 14:39:38 GMT PAR2NTG36FJGNCJN4M2HCTSVYY https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-country-garden-says-over-30-projects-have-local-government-support-2024-02-03/Reuters世界中国
